DataShape.description: A default data shape used to define the infotable with the actions to display on the Toolbar (themable) widget
DataShape.name: ToolbarAction

FieldDefinition.description: Controls whether the action is interactive or disabled
FieldDefinition.name: actionDisabled

FieldDefinition.description: A unique identifier for each row in the infotable.
FieldDefinition.name: actionId

FieldDefinition.description: The action label
FieldDefinition.name: actionLabel

FieldDefinition.description: The maximum width of the action on the toolbar
FieldDefinition.name: actionMaxWidth

FieldDefinition.description: The action tooltip
FieldDefinition.name: actionTooltip

FieldDefinition.description: The icon displayed within the action tooltip
FieldDefinition.name: actionTooltipIcon

FieldDefinition.description: The type of element to display for the toolbar action (button, link, dropdown or toggle button).
FieldDefinition.name: actionType

FieldDefinition.description: Controls the action visibility
FieldDefinition.name: actionVisible

FieldDefinition.description: An optional field that specifies a fixed width for the action on the toolbar.
FieldDefinition.name: actionWidth

FieldDefinition.description: Aligns the action to the right side of the toolbar. To align the action to the left, set the value to true.
FieldDefinition.name: alignRight

FieldDefinition.description: The icon to display on the Button
FieldDefinition.name: buttonIcon

FieldDefinition.description: The button variant to display (Primary, Secondary, Tertiary, Danger or Transparent).
FieldDefinition.name: buttonType

FieldDefinition.description: A JSON value that contains data for each drop-down list item. Each item is represented by a JSON object that contains the item label, value, and state (optional).
FieldDefinition.name: dropdownData

FieldDefinition.description: The hint text of the drop-down list.
FieldDefinition.name: dropdownHintText

FieldDefinition.description: The text of the selected item in the drop-down list.
FieldDefinition.name: dropdownSelectedText

FieldDefinition.description: The URL for the link
FieldDefinition.name: linkDestination

FieldDefinition.description: Controls how the link target window opens. You can open the link in a new window, current window, or a popup dialog box (New, Same or Popup).
FieldDefinition.name: linkTargetWindow

FieldDefinition.description: Shows or hides the chip icon, which is used to indicate selection.
FieldDefinition.name: toggleChipIcon

FieldDefinition.description: The position of the label on the toggle (Left or Right)
FieldDefinition.name: toggleLabelPosition

FieldDefinition.description: The state of the toggle switch
FieldDefinition.name: toggleState
